page.title: 20Credits.
page.content: Thanks are due to the many nameless people who assisted us on our travels especially the gentlemen of Helme Park.To the Tempest family for their help with the farming in the area and the Fir Tree W.I. for their information about Fir Tree.The two farmers who gave up part of their time to talk about their own farms whilst baling or turning the hay deserve a mention as does Miss A.Harrison of Hartside School for her information.My special thanks to certain members of the staff of Crook C.J.M. School for the time,patience and guidance but a special thanks to the children of Class 8 1984/5 whose willingness to work out of school made much of this possible. Thankyou, M.Urwin.
